DELETE_GROUP_CONFIRM_TEXT: Performing this action will permanently delete this group

PRIMARY_MEMBER_INFO: You can change the primary member later. The primary member's address is the group's address.
PRIMARY_MEMBER_ADDRESS: The primary member's address is the group's address.
MISSING_PRIMARY_MEMBER: This group needs a primary member.
MISSING_PRIMARY_MEMBER_INFO: Use the edit function to select one whose address will become the group address.

GROUPS_CARD_MEMBER_ERROR: There was a problem loading members

RELATIONSHIP_FAIL_TO_UPDATE: There’s a problem and we can’t update this relationship now.
ALREADY_EXISTS_RELATIONSHIP: This contact's relationship type already exists.
MISSING_HOLDINGS_INFO: This group needs at least one financial holding associated with it.
MISSING_HOLDINGS_SUB_INFO: Use the edit function to select financial holdings belonging to any member which are appropriate to associate with the group.
SELECT_FINANCIAL_HOLDING: There must be at least one holding selected.
